n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))


x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split())) # ここでxに数字を格納
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0: # 偶数個の数字がある場合
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else: # 奇数個の数字がある場合
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

# x = [1, 2, 3]
# n = 3

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)


print(min_cost)

import heapq


def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))

    x.sort()

    min_cost = float('inf')
    for i in range(n):
        cost = 0
        for j in range(n):
            cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
        min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

    print(min_cost)


main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n // 2] - x[n // 2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
